job description:
Machine Learning Scientist
Based in Sunnyvale we are one of, if not the hottest Machine Learning Ops companies in the business.

Are you interested in designing and implementing algorithms and ML pipelines? Are you looking to take full responsibility for developing optimized machine learning and deep learning algorithms with best-in- class performance for both streaming and large batch processing applications?

If this sounds like you and you have a MS or Ph.D in Computer Science, Mathematics or a related field, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
1. Disruptive and innovative are just a few words to describe us
2. We already have over 50 employee's and have been around for less than three years
3. Competitive Base + Equity + Health Benefits and unlimited PTO
4. We have fun and are deeply passionate about what we do and what we are trying to accomplish
5. The chance to join a funded, yet established start-up in an exciting space as our first Machine Learning Engineer
What You Need for this Position
- BS or Ph.D in related field
- Technical knowledge in one or more of the following area's: Machine Learning Algorithms, Statistical Modeling, Deep Learning, NLP
- Ability to build machine learning pipelines in either Spark, Tensorflow or similar products
- Hands on development and coding experience in either Python, Scala or Java
So, if you are a Machine Learning Scientist the experience above, please send over an updated resume to me at ben.stehle@cybercoders.com!
-

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.



CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
